page.title: 11PILNING,ALMONDSBURY CLUBS
page.content: In Pilning there is an active amateur dramatic society, The Village Players, who meet in the Village Hall. They produce plays and a pantomime at Christmas. They have an active youth section which joins in the adult production and produce plays for themselves. The Brick-works have sports clubs and the football club plays on their own pitch by the works in Almondsbury. Pilning cricket, tennis, football and hockey clubs all meet at the Village Playing-fields with regular fixtures. I.C.I. employees have a field in the area for their sports club. Recreational activities include horse riding, cycling, walking, gardening & flower arranging. Bingo is held in the Village Hall.People travel out of the area for swimming,badminton, croquet, brownies and cubs, and sailing.
